name: Polinomialand
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN
Polinomialand: My second installment in my personal 2019 Game a Month challenge

Where's the first you ask? ...Let's not talk about it. At least I finished the second month!
The ground is drawn in a procedurally generated path and disappears behind you. Take down the battleship!

Q: Why is the objective to destroy the ship which is creating the world?
A: Good question. I have no idea

Please feel free to drop any feedback you like. Enjoy!
